## `SetPlotBackgroundImageEffect`

Sets the effect applied to an image when drawn as a graph's background for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetPlotBackgroundImageEffect(ImageEffect imageEffect)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|[`ImageEffect`](#imageeffect) imageEffect | The effect to render with. |
